item.name: service.name
item.documentation: The name of this service, use for posting metrics and logging.

item.name: service.port
item.documentation: The port used by Jetty to expose this service

item.name: service.logging.path
item.documentation: The location where the service should write its log files

item.name: service.logging.level
item.documentation: The overall logging level for the service. Defaults to warn.

item.name: service.logging.consolethreshold
item.documentation: The threshold at which the logger will log to the console.

item.name: service.logging.filethreshold
item.documentation: The threshold at which the logger will log to the filesystem. Defaults to info.

item.name: service.logging.servicethreshold
item.documentation: The threshold at which the logger will log to the error logging service

item.name: service.graphite.post.unit
item.documentation: Time unit for interval for graphite metrics reporting

item.name: service.graphite.enabled
item.documentation: Whether to enable graphite metrics reporting

item.name: service.production
item.documentation: Switch on production mode - disable reloading and stack traces from leaving the application
